snippet.title: Twin Flames Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description: Twin Flames is an action 2D platformer with roguelike elements and a focus on fast-paced combat and speedy movement. You can choose to be either one of the siblings and must defeat the other one. However, there’s a catch, if you take too long to reach the top of the Time Tower, your powers will die and the other god will rule time forever. So this is not only a battle against your enemies, this is a battle against time itself.
